description: This source file defines API endpoints for managing income transactions, including creating, listing, and deleting income records for authenticated users, using FastAPI, SQLAlchemy ORM, and Pydantic schemas.

classes.name: IncomeCreate
classes.description: Pydantic model for payload to create an income entry.

methods.name: TransactionSchema create_income( payload: IncomeCreate, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
methods.description: API handler to create a new income transaction for the authenticated user.

methods.name: list[TransactionSchema] list_income( db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], month: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1, le=12, description="Month number (1-12)"), year: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1900, le=9999, description="Year (e.g., 2025)"), )
methods.description: API handler to list income transactions filtered optionally by month and year for the authenticated user.

methods.name: None delete_income( id: int, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )
methods.description: API handler to delete an income transaction by ID if it belongs to the current user.

ctags.name: amount
ctags.pattern: /^    amount: float = Field(..., description="Income amount (positive number)")$/

ctags.name: category
ctags.pattern: /^    category: str = Field(..., description="Category for the income (e.g., Salary)")$/

ctags.name: create_income
ctags.signature: ( payload: IncomeCreate, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )

ctags.name: delete_income
ctags.signature: ( id: int, db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], )

ctags.name: list_income
ctags.signature: ( db: Annotated[Session, Depends(get_db)], current_user: Annotated[User, Depends(get_current_user)], month: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1, le=12, description="Month number (1-12)"), year: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=1900, le=9999, description="Year (e.g., 2025)"), )
